question: Refer to the figure <image 1>, which term refers to lines that give the impression of calm and tranquility, such as those seen in the ocean and open prairies?
description: The image displays a single, straight black line that runs horizontally across the center of a white background. The line is uniform in thickness and extends from one edge of the image to the other, maintaining a consistent horizontal orientation throughout its length. There are no other lines, shapes, or elements present in the image. The overall appearance is simple and uncluttered, with the horizontal line being the sole focus.
